Author: Karina V.
Title: [ANN] APIS TOKEN SALE IS LIVE ON WAVES DEX
Body: The transfer of pollen from a male part of a plant (anther) to a female part of a plant (stigma), of the same species, is called pollination. This enables fertilisation and the production of seeds.     Pollination is important to plants and to pollinators also. From the flowers that they visit, pollinators receive nectar and/or pollen (sugary nectar provides pollinators with carbohydrates). Pollen offers proteins, fats, vitamins, minerals, and necessary phytochemicals. Author: AdiFarcas
Title: [ANN] APIS TOKEN SALE IS LIVE ON WAVES DEX
Body: "Known pollinators, and the most responsible for pollination, are:  – bees (the most efficient ones and one of the most important insect pollinators) – prefer blue or yellow flowers and those that are sweet-smelling; – butterflies like flowers that are red, yellow, or orange; scent doesn’t matter as they rely more on vision to find nectar; – hummingbirds – are attracted to red, orange, or yellow flowers; as they do not have a highly developed sense of smell, flower scent doesn’t matter for them; – moths – are attracted to sweet-scented flowers; – bats – like flowers that are large and white or pale in color; – wasps; – flies; – beetles – attracted to flowers that are white or green; – wind – some factors has to be taken in consideration like power of the wind, area, plants and distance; – water – but only for a very few terrestrial plants."  More details on: https://apismellifera.io/pollination-and-pollinators/ More articles on: https://apismellifera.io/blog/

Author: Karina V.
Title: [ANN] APIS TOKEN SALE IS LIVE ON WAVES DEX
Body: APIS Beechain: Adopting bees and developing a community project, a shop, a pool, an eco-lab.  🐝 🍯 APIS token is a beekeeping project start-up undertaken by a team of bee enthusiast individuals based in Romania. It was born from blockchain, crypto sphere community and it is promoted online for finding people interested to help the project. At the same time, it is a real growing operation happening in Romania(because of the virgin nature it is one of the best places in Europe for bees).  👉 APIS token allows you to adopt a hive of your own and manage it through the online portal. When you buy APIS token you will get your personal hive that is created by the APIS team with a new family of bees that you adopted, and also you get honey from them for a lifetime.  👉 You can also customize your paint on the box of the hive, for example, you can have your or company's name and logo on it.  👉 CCTV cameras are being implemented soon which would allow adopters to watch their hive live at any point of the time.  In other words, APIS Token is functioning like any other cryptographic token out there in the ecosystem, AND also it links with APIS beechain Adoptions real-world operation.  For example, 30 000 APIS tokens would also bring you instantly: 🌞 A hive and a bees family adopted. 🌞 A kg of honey/month or, if you have more hives(10+ recommended) you get half of hive production/month(see distribution logistics in whitepaper) When our bees managing platform is ready, you need to freeze the tokens for the hive adoption to be concretized. If you don’t, you can do whatever you’d like with the tokens and we will further keep the hive ourselves for the operation. So, anyone that buy 30 000 APIS minimum, is actually remotely ordering the team to build another hive and fill it with adopted bees family and start taking care of them.  This is already happening since Pre-Sale for waves community started in 1st of May 2018.  Telegram: https://t.me/apismelliferaio Website: https://apismellifera.io

The program will be available until the end of the Token Sale (until 15 June 2018). The bounties will be paid within 3 to 9 days after the end of the Token Sale.   APIS Tokens offered in the Bounty Campaign are for promoting bees as a vital element in the world – not as an investment opportunity. Any content that will associate APIS Token with an investment or be involving APIS in a security token matter will be removed.  Please fill out this form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1P6Fx0bWYw9X3gMaO-Zx0yM2kKqw2jmFt6ywwtZNTCRo/prefill to confirm your participation in APIS Bounty Campaign. The activity of the supporters will be recorded and updated daily. We reserve the right to limit the number of participants in any of the campaigns, we also reserve the right to change the conditions of our bounty campaign. One account is allowed for each participant, using multi-accounts or any form of cheating and/or spamming will lead to account removal and ceasing of communication from our part.      We reserve the right to check our supporters bounty-related activities and, in case of irregularities, their account and all the stakes related to that activity will be removed.  All posts/articles should be meaningful and make sense in the context of APIS Token, cryptocurrency, blockchain and, most important, the relationship between bees and our environment. Since quality is very a subjective matter, APIS Team will be the only arbiter in this process.  Our Bounty Campaign token rewards allocation :  Facebook                                                                                         Bounties: 15% Twitter                                                                                             Bounties: 15% Blogs and Articles Campaign                                                      Bounties: 50% YouTube Campaign                                                                         Bounties: 20%   Facebook Campaign:  Rewards:  - 75.000 APIS Tokens will be rewarded to registered and approved participants (percent of Tokens – quantification of each participant); - per task: up to 40 APIS Tokens.   How to join: Follow and like us here on https://www.facebook.com/apismellifera.io/  7 posts/re-posts (maximum) in a week of our content. 1 post per day. Posts older than this reporting week are not accepted. All posts have to be with a hashtag #ApisToken #cryptocurrency #wavesplatform Your account must be at least 6 months old. Do not RP posts replying to other users. Re-posts & posts must remain public until the end of the Bounty Campaign. Facebook accounts must be original. Inactive accounts or accounts with fake followers will not be accepted.   Twitter Campaign:  Rewards:  - 75.000 APIS Tokens will be rewarded to registered and approved participants (percent of Tokens – quantification of each participant); - per task: up to 40 APIS Tokens.   How to join: Follow us here on https://twitter.com/APIS_Token  Minimum rank (bitcointalk) of the participant: Jr. Member. 7 tweets/retweets (maximum) in a week of personal or APIS content. 1 tweet per day. Posts older than this reporting week are not accepted. All tweets have to be with a hashtag #ApisToken $Waves #SaveTheBees #wavesplatform Your account must be at least 6 months old. Your audit score must be more than 90%. Do not RT tweets replying to other users. Retweets & tweets must stay public until the end of the Bounty campaign. Twitter account must be original. Inactive account or account with fake followers will not be accepted. The program will be available till the end of the Token Sale (until 15 June 2018). The bounties will be paid within 3 to 9 days after the end of the Token Sale.   APIS Tokens offered in the Bounty Campaign are for promoting bees as a vital element in the world – not as an investment opportunity. Any content that will associate APIS Token  with an investment or involving APIS in a security token matter will be removed.  Please fill out this form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1P6Fx0bWYw9X3gMaO-Zx0yM2kKqw2jmFt6ywwtZNTCRo/prefill to confirm your participation in APIS Bounty Campaign. The activity of the supporters will be recorded and updated daily. We reserve the right to limit the amount of participants in any of the campaigns, we also reserve the right to change the conditions of our bounty campaign. One account is allowed for each participant, using multi-accounts or any form of cheating and/or spamming will lead to account removal and ceasing of communication from our part.      We reserve the right to check our supporters bounty related activities and, in case of irregularities, their account and all the stakes related to that activity will be removed.  All posts/articles should be meaningful and make sense in the context of APIS Token, cryptocurrency, blockchain and, most important, the relationship between bees and our environment . Since quality is very a subjective matter, APIS Team will be the only arbiter in this process. Author: Crypto Esco
Title: [ANN] APIS TOKEN SALE IS LIVE ON WAVES DEX
Body: Also this:   Product Shares  For the adoption owners will have different shares: 1. Basic Account - adopt between 1 and 9 hives – we will share: - 1 kg of honey per month; - limited platform access.  2. Premium Account - adopt between 10 and 49 hives – we will share: - 50% honey production; - one visit per year (7 days) at your Hives; - apiculture course with a diploma; - manage your personal bee hives business plan (active platform access).  3. Business Account - adopt between 50 and 100 hives (1 apiary) – we will share: - 50% production share (different type of honey, pollen, wax); - 25% more bee families after 1 year; - two visits per year (7 days) at your Hives; - apiculture course with a diploma; - manage your personal bee hives business plan (active platform access).  Purpose of raising funds  APIS Token Sale will be the startup for Bees Adoption in blockchain and cryptocurrency world: - for the first year, we plan to have up to 1000 adopted bee families; - the second year up to 2000 new adopted bee families; - the third year we will provide another 2 new Honeycomb Clusters (and another 1000 bee families will be prepared for adoption).  APIS Eco-Value - bee-breeding population  To accomplish the main goal, APIS Team propose the project architecture as below:      Because of the limitations, each colony is projected to have a maximum of 1300 Bee Families in the first year of adoption. To adopt a Bee Family, each: - Alpha colony adopter will need to lock an initial 30.000 APIS Token in the platform, to reserve the spot in the Adoption Whitelist; - Beta colony architecture: the initial amount to reserve a spot will be maximum 20.000 APIS Token; - for Gamma colony, the initial amount will be maximum 10.000 APIS Token.
